newsitem.title: JAPAN: Sogo shares up on Oriental Land hopes.
newsitem.headline: Sogo shares up on Oriental Land hopes.

text.p: Shares in Sogo Co Ltd were bid-only in Wednesday morning trade, as hopes that the listing of Oriental Land later this year may inspire a bullish mood in the stock market spurred interest in Sogo, traders said.
Sogo, a department store operator, holds shares in Oriental Land, they said.
The Sogo shares were bid-only at 523 yen at 0102 GMT, compared with the last traded price of 498 yen on Tuesday.
